## IAnnotationStyle interface

A style that can be applied to an annotation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IAnnotationStyle 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [fillColor?](./chart-def.iannotationstyle.fillcolor.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Fill Color of the region when the second value is supplied for an annotation. |
|  [label?](./chart-def.iannotationstyle.label.md) | [IAnnotationLabelStyle](./chart-def.iannotationlabelstyle.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Sets the style for the annotation's label. |
|  [lineColor?](./chart-def.iannotationstyle.linecolor.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Color of the annotation line. |
|  [lineLength?](./chart-def.iannotationstyle.linelength.md) | string \| number | <i>(Optional)</i> Sets the length for aN annotation line on the Y axis. Doesn't apply to the X axis. |
|  [offsetX?](./chart-def.iannotationstyle.offsetx.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Sets the left offset for annotation line. |
|  [offsetY?](./chart-def.iannotationstyle.offsety.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Sets the top offset for annotation line. |
|  [opacity?](./chart-def.iannotationstyle.opacity.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Opacity of the filled region. |
|  [strokeDashArray?](./chart-def.iannotationstyle.strokedasharray.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Creates dashes in borders of the SVG path. A higher number creates more space between dashes in the border. |
